post.title: ces:samsung 2012 plasma links
post.content: so lets get the ball rolllling got to say i'm loving the sound of this. bloomin chicken feet still but like the black.samsung pne8000 plasma boasts best features, improved picture | ces 2012: televisions - cnet blogs i'll post the vids when we have them. new vids up video: ces 2012 - samsung series 8 3d plasma hdtv launched video: ces 2012 - samsung series 7 plasma hdtv launched video: ces 2012 - samsung series 6 plasma hdtv launched
